name: Spooky Deco
description:
Spooky Deco is a click and drag  game where you can place objects down and arrange them the way you want. The catch to this game is for every block that you don't want that you throw into the fire , a random block that is already placed down is sacrificed too.

This was a small game concept developed for the Spooktoberfest Game Jam.

I would also love to see your creations so please pop some screenshots in your comments!

Cheers!
